name: minimal-bento-like-portfolio
title: Minimal Bento-like Portfolio
desc: Astro-bento-portfolio is a minimal bento-like (almost) single-page portfolio website made in Astro
article:
A minimal bento-like (almost) single-page portfolio website made in Astro


Features


  • Modern and Minimal bento-like, sleek UI Design
  • All in one page (almost)
  • Fully Responsive
  • Performances and SEO optimizations
  • Ready to be deployed on https://www.netlify.com/
  • Blog
  • RSS support (your-domain/rss.xml)
  • Cool 3D globe to show where you have traveled
  • Digital Clock



To view a demo example: https://sparkly-speculoos-0c9197.netlify.app

or my portfolio: https://gianmarcocavallo.com
